pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clean Data Frames // Provides a friendly interface for modifying data frames with a sequence of piped commands built upon the 'tidyverse' Wickham et al., (2019) doi:10.21105/joss.01686 . The majority of commands wrap 'dplyr' mutate statements in a convenient way to concisely solve common issues that arise when tidying small to medium data sets. Includes smart defaults and allows flexible selection of columns via 'tidyselect'.
